title: assist.response.v0.1
description: Response schema for a11y-assist with optional audit metadata

anchored_id.description: Error ID this assist is anchored to, if found

safest_next_step.description: Single safest next action to take

plan.description: Ordered list of steps to resolve the issue

next_safe_commands.description: SAFE-only commands that can be run

methods_applied.description: Stable method identifiers applied to produce this assist output (audit-only)

field.description: Which output field this evidence supports (e.g., safest_next_step, plan[0])

note.description: Optional short note clarifying the mapping

evidence.description: Trace anchors mapping assist content back to input (audit-only)
